articles.title: Repo rate hiked again; RBI retains GDP growth forecast at 7.2% - Hindustan Times
articles.description: RBI Monetary Policy: The real GDP growth for the current year has been retained at 7.2%, RBI governor Shaktikanta Das said. Inflation has been revised to 6.7% from 5.7% earlier for the current year.
